.lunch .b-resize-handle.title: Time ranges
.lunch .b-resize-handle.content: Drag to change duration of the time ranges. SHIFT+drag to move it

.b-sch-line .b-resize-handle.title: Lines
.b-sch-line .b-resize-handle.content: Drag to change move the line

[data-ref=todayButton].title: Go to today
[data-ref=todayButton].content: To see the current time line
